document.full_text: russia's maria sharapova reached her first final in seven months with a 3-6 6-0 6-2 victory over germany's andrea petkovic at the sony ericsson open thursday.
document.title: sharapova overpowers petkovic to reach miami final
lines_and_colors: russia's maria sharapova reached her first final in seven months with a 3-6 6-0 6-2 victory over germany's andrea petkovic at the sony ericsson open thursday.
